COPY_KEYSTORE_TIPS: Please copy your keystore to the box
PASSWORD_RULE: Length 6-18, numbers and letters both included
KEYSTORE_ERROR: Illegal keystore file or incorrect payment password.
KEYSTORE_EMPTY: The keystore should not be empty.
CLICK_MNEMONIC: Please click the mnemonics by order
NEW_PASSWORD_EMPTY: The new payment password should not be empty.
ORIGINAL_PASSWORD_EMPTY: The original payment password should not be empty.
PASSWORD_ERROR: The payment password is incorrent, please check!
WXPORT_KEYSTORE_TIPS: You'd better save the keystore into offline devices, and don't send it by internet.
KEYSTORE_COPYIED_SUCCRRF: The keystore is copied to copyboard.
BACKUP_MNEMONIC_TIPS: The mnemonic means the whole control of your wallet, please make sure you have backuped to your offline devices.
PASSEORD_ERROR: Please input the correct payment password
EXPORT_PRIVATEKEY_TIPS: The mnemonic means the whole control of your wallet, please make sure you have backuped to your offline devices.
EXPORT_PRIVATEKEY_MINER: Export wallet to your PC tool
RECEIVE_ADDR: Attention: The address only support {{value}}, any other assets transfered to it may get lostÔºÅ
COPY_WALLET_SUCCEED: Wallet address copyied to clipboard successfully!
INPUT_AMOUNT_TIPS: Please input the amount to send
INPUT_ADDR_TIPS: Please input your POC wallet address
NONCE_ERROR: Transaction failed, you can raise up the gas to make sure transaction successfully handled.
ADDRESS_EMPTY: The POC address should not be empty
PLEDGE_MINING_SLOGAN: Pledge your POC to earn more!
INPUT_PLEDGE_AMOUNT: Please input the amount for pledge
INPUT_DRAWBACK_AMOUNT: Please input the amount for drawback
PLEDGE_AMOUNT_EXCCEED: The pledge amount excceed your balance
DRAWBACK_AMOUNT_EXCCEED: The drawback amount excceed your pledge amount
WALLET_NAME_EMPTY: The wallet name should not be empty
REQUEST_ERROR: Request error, please contact the admistrator.
NETWORK_TIMEOUT: Request timeout, please try it later
BACKEND_ERROR: The backend service can not be connected
BACKEND_NOT_EXIST: The request address can not be found
BACKEND_ERROR1: Backend service error, please try it later
